thread.title: Actors have to go through awkward situations: Shah Rukh Khan
thread.title_full: Actors have to go through awkward situations: Shah Rukh Khan

author: Wires English | Press Trust of India
title: Actors have to go through awkward situations: Shah Rukh Khan
text:
Comments Mumbai, Oct 24 : Shah Rukh Khan says actors do go through awkward situations but they cannot show that they are not liking it. The 49-year-old actor, who is busy with the final leg of “Dilwale” shootings, said they are not left with any other choices.“Awkward weird strange uncomfortable. Actors have to do what they have to do and show they are enjoying it. (Also Read: Akshay Kumar pictured with daughter Nitara on family holiday in England! See pics) That is the only explanation to start the day,” he posted on Twitter. The trailer of “Dilwale” will be released along with Salman Khan-starrer “Prem Ratan Dhan Payo”. Shah Rukh will also be seen in Aditya Chopra’s “Fan” and Rahul Dholakia-directed “Raees”.
